Spells.name: Eye of God
Spells.text:
You may use the Eye of God successfully only once per Battle. Choose a single model within 6".
Roll a D6 to see the result:

1 - The Model is taken out of action immediately, but must not roll on the serious injuries chart.

2-5 - The Model gains +1 on any Characteristic for the remainder of the battle.

6 - The Model gains +1 on ALL its Characteristics for the remainder of the battle.

Spells.name: Spell of Doom
Spells.text: Choose one enemy model within 12". The model must immediately take a Strength test. If it fails, you may roll on the Injury table to see what happens to the unfortunate warrior.

Spells.name: Fires of U'Zhul
Spells.text: Range 18". Fire 1 S4 Fireball that automatically hits the target.

Spells.name: Silver Arrows of Arha
Spells.text:
Range 24".
Can't be cast whilst in combat. Fire D6+2 S3 arrows with the BS of the caster but ignore movement, range and cover penalties.

Spells.name: Zzap!
Spells.text:
Range 12".
Causes D3 hits with S4 on the closest enemy model, that ignore armour saves.

Spells.name: Stench of Nurgle
Spells.text:
Range 6".
Each enemy warrior in range must pass a Toughness test or lose an Attack until their next turn.

Spells.name: Daemonic Vigour
Spells.text:
Range 8".
Any Plague Bearers or Nurglings within range increase their Daemonic Aura save from 5+ to 4+ until the beginning of their next turn.

Spells.name: Buboes
Spells.text:
Range 8".
Target an enemy model in range. The model must pass a Toughness test or lose a Wound. No Armour saves are allowed.

Spells.name: Pestilence
Spells.text:
Range 12".
All enemy models in range suffer a Strength 3 hit. No Armour saves are allowed.

Spells.name: Scabrous Hide
Spells.text: The Master has an armour save of 2+ which replaces any normal Armour save. The effect lasts until the beginning of his next Shooting phase.

Spells.name: The Hammer of Sigmar
Spells.text: The wielder gains +2 Strength in hand-to-hand combat and all hits he inflicts cause double damage (eg, 2 wounds instead of 1). The prayer lasts until the next shooting phase.

Spells.name: Hearts of Steel
Spells.text:
Range 8".
Any allied warriors within range become immune to Fear and All Alone tests.
In addition, the whole warband gains +1 to any Rout tests they have to make. The effects of this spell last until the caster is knocked down, stunned or put out of action.

The effects of this payer are not cummulative.

Spells.name: Soulfire
Spells.text:
Range 4".
All enemy models within range suffer a Strength 3 hit.
No armour saves are allowed.
Undead and Possessed models in range suffer a Strength 5 hit instead.

Spells.name: Shield of Faith
Spells.text: The Priest is immune to all spells. Roll at the beginning of each turn in the recovery phase. On a roll of 1 or 2 the shield disappears.

Spells.name: Healing Hand
Spells.text:
Range 2".
 Any one model within range (including himself) may be healed. The warrior is restored to his full quota of Wounds and if the model is stunned or knocked down, they immediately stand up, and continue fighting as normal.

Spells.name: Armour of Righteousness
Spells.text:
The Priest has an armour save of 2+ which replaces his normal armour save.
In addition, he causes fear in his enemies and is therefore immune to fear himself.
The effect lasts until the beginning of his next Shooting phase.
